heroicTraits.name: Mighty Archaeossian
heroicTraits.lore: The fossilised bone from which this hero is formed is supernaturally hard.
heroicTraits.effect: If the unmodified hit roll for an **attack** that targets this unit is 1-3, the **attack** fails and the **attack** sequence ends.

heroicTraits.name: Aura of Sterility
heroicTraits.lore: Ending magics shroud this hero, sapping the force from arrows and other projectiles.
heroicTraits.effect: Subtract 1 from wound rolls for shooting attacks that target friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

heroicTraits.name: Diversionary Tactics
heroicTraits.lore: Infused with especially cunning souls, this hero uses all manner of snares and ruses to hinder a foe’s advance.
heroicTraits.effect: Subtract 2 from **charge** rolls for enemy units while they are within 12" of this unit.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Marrowpact
spearheadEnhancements.lore: The glyphs borne to war by your general bind those who view them in arcane pacts.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Each time your general uses a ****FIGHT**** ability, after all of their attacks have been resolved, **Heal (X)** your general where **X** is the number of damage points allocated by those attacks.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Empower Nadirite Weapons
spearheadEnhancements.lore: Soulreaper can call upon stolen life essence to bolster nadirite weapons.
spearheadEnhancements.declare: Pick a visible friendly **Mortek Guard** unit wholly within 12" of your general, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: On a 5+, until the start of your next turn, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of that unit’s melee weapons.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Unstoppable Commander
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This Soulreaper’s animus contains the essence of a brilliant commander that can still urge their troops to victory.
spearheadEnhancements.declare: Pick a friendly **Mortek Guard** unit wholly within 12" your general, then roll a dice.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: On a 2+, add 3" to that unit’s **Move** characteristic this phase.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Murderous Drive
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This Soulreaper is animated by especially vicious and warlike spirits.

battleTraits.name: Contingent Arrival
battleTraits.lore: Marching in perfect unison, a reinforcing unit of Mortek Guard arrives.
battleTraits.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield wholly within 3" of a battlefield edge and more than 6" from all enemy units.
battleTraits.subsectionLore: The Ossiarch commanders will bolster their forces wherever battle is met.
battleTraits.subsectionRulesText: One of your **Mortek Guard** units is not set up during the deployment phase. Instead, from the third battle round onwards, it can use the Contingent Arrival ability.

battleTraits.name: Coordinated Charge
battleTraits.lore: At a signal, the Ossiarch legions charge in unison.
battleTraits.declare: If no friendly units have used a ****RELENTLESS DISCIPLINE**** ability this phase, pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS **HERO**** to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to **charge** rolls for friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS** units while they are wholly within 12" of that ****HERO****.

battleTraits.name: Counter-strike
battleTraits.lore: The Ossiarchs ready their weapons for an enemy assault.
battleTraits.declare: If no friendly units have used a ****RELENTLESS DISCIPLINE**** ability this phase, pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS **HERO**** to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: For the rest of the turn, friendly units’ melee weapons have **Anti‑**charge** (+1 Rend)** while they are wholly within 12" of that ****HERO****.

battleTraits.name: Impenetrable Ranks
battleTraits.lore: Ossiarch warriors snap into defensive formations that grant them even greater resilience.
battleTraits.declare: If no friendly units have used a ****RELENTLESS DISCIPLINE**** ability this phase, pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS **HERO**** to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: For the rest of the turn, friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS** have **WARD (5+)** while they are wholly within 12" of that ****HERO****.

battleTraits.name: Re-form Ranks
battleTraits.lore: Bonereapers swiftly disengage and charge back into the fray.
battleTraits.declare: If no friendly units have used a ****RELENTLESS DISCIPLINE**** ability this phase, pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS **HERO**** to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: For the rest of the turn, while they are wholly within 12" of that **Hero**, friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS** units can use ****CHARGE**** abilities even if they used a ****RETREAT**** ability in the same turn.

battleTraits.name: Bludgeon
battleTraits.lore: The Bonereapers deliver blows that make a mockery of armour.
battleTraits.declare: If no friendly units have used a ****RELENTLESS DISCIPLINE**** ability this phase, pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS **HERO**** to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS** units while they are wholly within 12" of that ****HERO****.

battleTraits.name: Unstoppable Advance
battleTraits.lore: The Ossiarchs advance at a remorseless pace.
battleTraits.declare: If no friendly units have used a ****RELENTLESS DISCIPLINE**** ability this phase, pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS **HERO**** to use this ability. All friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS** units wholly within 12" of that ****HERO**** are the targets.
battleTraits.effect: Add 2" to the **Move** characteristic of each target for the rest of the turn.

regimentAbilities.name: Re-form Ranks
regimentAbilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Movement Phase
regimentAbilities.lore: A group of Bonereapers swiftly disengages from combat with flawless precision.
regimentAbilities.declare: Pick a friendly **Mortek Guard** unit in combat to use this ability.
regimentAbilities.effect: That unit can use a ****RETREAT**** ability this phase without any mortal damage being inflicted on it.

regimentAbilities.name: Inpenetrable Ranks
regimentAbilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
regimentAbilities.lore: If given the order, Ossiarch warriors will snap into an unyielding defensive line.
regimentAbilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit to use this ability.
regimentAbilities.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to ward rolls for that unit.

artefactsOfPower.name: Helm of Tyranny
artefactsOfPower.lore: This helm radiates the oppressive will of the wearer, filling nearby foes with supernatural dread.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Subtract 2 from the control scores of enemy units while they are within 12" of this unit.

artefactsOfPower.name: Lode of Saturation
artefactsOfPower.lore: This ingot of nadirite–iron alloy, when pressed against a bone construct, renders its structure nigh invulnerable.

artefactsOfPower.name: Marrowpact
artefactsOfPower.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
artefactsOfPower.lore: The glyphs borne to war by this champion bind those who view them in arcane pacts that siphon the energy from their bone marrow.
artefactsOfPower.effect: For the rest of the turn, if the unmodified hit roll for a combat **attack** that targets this unit is 1-2, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the ****FIGHT**** ability has been resolved.

regimentOfRenown.name: Collect the Tithe
regimentOfRenown.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
regimentOfRenown.declare: Pick the **Gothizzar Harvester** in this Regiment of Renown to use this ability, then pick a non-****HERO** **INFANTRY**** unit (friendly or enemy) to be the target.
regimentOfRenown.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll equals or exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain, then give the unit using this ability 1 **bone-tithe point**.

regimentOfRenown.name: Soul Tax
regimentOfRenown.lore: Part of the Ossiarchs’ tithe is inevitably a portion of their allies’ souls.
regimentOfRenown.declare:
Pick the ****Mortisan** Ossifector** in this Regiment of Renown to cast this **spell**, then:

• Pick a friendly unit, excluding units in this Regiment of Renown, to be the target.
• Pick a unit in this Regiment of Renown to be the **recipient**.

The target and the **recipient** must be wholly within 12" of and visible to the caster. Then, make a casting roll of 2D6.
regimentOfRenown.effect:
Until the start of your next turn:

• The target has a maximum control score of 1.
• Add 1 to hit rolls and wound rolls for the **recipient**’s combat attacks.

regimentOfRenown.name: Rebuild On The March
regimentOfRenown.lore: Ossiarch war-constructs can fashion new warriors at a fearsome rate if bone is in ample supply.
regimentOfRenown.declare: Pick the **Gothizzar Harvester** in this Regiment of Renown to use this ability if it has 6 **bone-tithe points**. Then, pick another unit in this Regiment of Renown that has been destroyed to be the target.
regimentOfRenown.effect: Reset the **Gothizzar Harvester**’s **bone-tithe points** to 0. Then, set up a replacement of the target unit with half the number of models (rounding up) wholly within 9" of the **Gothizzar Harvester** and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Summon Bone-tithe Shrieker
abilities.lore: The caster conjures a four-headed, all-seeing monstrosity to hunt down those who would escape the Ossiarch tithe.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Bone‑tithe Shrieker** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Bone-tithe Shrieker** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Summon Soulstealer Carrion
abilities.lore: Soaring from its caster’s spread fingertips, the Soulstealer Carrion takes wing above the battlefield.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Soulstealer Carrion** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Soulstealer Carrion** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Summon Nightmare Predator
abilities.lore: The Nightmare Predator is a looming conjuration of Shyishan magic that takes the form of a disturbing terror.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Nightmare Predator** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Nightmare Predator** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Empower Nadirite Weapons
abilities.lore: The caster imbues nadirite weapons with deadly power.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS** unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: The target’s combat attacks score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+ until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Shard Storm
abilities.lore: The caster conjures forth a great cloud of bone-shards and hurls them at the foe.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Drain Vitality
abilities.lore: This cursed spell saps a foe’s strength, leaving them weak and vulnerable.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s attacks and subtract 1 from save rolls for the target.

abilities.name: Necrotic Symphony
abilities.lore: Each Mortisan thrives in the presence of their fellow craftsmen, their arcane might spiralling as the collective magnifies their individual potency.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS INFANTRY WIZARDS**.

abilities.name: Swift as Death
abilities.lore: Kavalos formations dominate the battlefield with their sheer speed, seeking out the enemy’s weakest point before sending a deadly charge crashing home.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS CAVALRY** units to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Each target can move 6" but cannot end that move in combat.

abilities.name: Send in the Reserve
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.lore: The Mortek Guard are deployed in deep ranks, with strategic reserves ready to enter the fray whenever the cohesion of the battleline is threatened.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **Mortek Guard** unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 5+, set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Crawling Barrage
abilities.lore: Ossiarch artillery is best utilised en masse, unleashing their necrotic payload from a secure position behind the Mortek ranks.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **Mortek Crawler** units that are wholly within friendly territory and that have not used a **MOVE** ability this turn to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for each target’s shooting attacks for the rest of the turn.
